alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Sanilac; Shiawassee; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 4:24AM EST until February 03 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Lapeer, Livingston, Sanilac, Macomb, Shiawassee, Genesee, St. Clair and Oakland Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain transitions to snow this morning. Snow and falling temperatures will result in snow covered and slick roads. Peak snowfall occurs midday with rates up to an inch per hour at times. Gusty north winds this afternoon and evening may lead to some blowing and drifting snow and poor visibilities. Snow rates drop off overnight with light snow or flurries continuing through Thursday. Up to an inch of additional accumulation is possible on Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Sanilac; Shiawassee; St. Clair
